```{r setup}
library(tidyverse) #ggplot, readr, tibble
```

## `pivot_longer`

Load the PULSE data

```{r}
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```


Wide format to long format ...


```{r}
pulse_data_tidy = 
  pulse_data %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  )
#names_prefix	:A regular expression used to remove matching text from the start of each variable name.
```

rewrite, combine, and extend(to add a mutate)
```{r}
#relocate(xxx,yyy)把xxx，yyy按顺序提前
#mutate(想改变的对象（variable） = recode(想改变的对象，“想要被替代的内容” = “想要的内容"))
pulse_data = 
  haven::read_sas("./data/public_pulse_data.sas7bdat") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  pivot_longer(
    bdi_score_bl:bdi_score_12m,
    names_to = "visit",
    names_prefix = "bdi_score_",
    values_to = "bdi"
  ) %>% 
  relocate(id, visit) %>% 
  mutate(visit = recode(visit, "bl" = "00m"))
```
